title: Single buff ganking meta?
body:
Anyone else think that perhaps there is a different way of clearing that leaves a jungler to gank a lane after each buff?

I was giving it some thought and decided i might want to try something like gromp>scuttle>wolves>blue>gank top or mid then b, then rinse repeat for red side.... maybe i'm crazy, but it seems to make sense to me, anyway I am gonna try it and I'll report back
